law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 323, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 517, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 461, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 295, sec. 49, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 200, sec. 3.
